attributes.action: Please place full pressure on the Chinese government to cease thier obscene cruelty to animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Animal Cruelty in China must be stopped! The conditions in which the animals are kept in during their lives are disgusting and needs to be addressed. Animals used in the fur trade in China are barbarically tortured as they are beaten and skinned alive. At least kill the animal humanely first. This trade is sickening and needs to be stopped immediately! Please put full pressure on the Chinese government to end this massacre.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Please place full pressure on the Chinese government to cease thier obscene cruelty to animals."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13697.asp

Prime Minister's Office
